channel.description: Recent content in Portable on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio

item.title: Project Aiga: a portable VHF/UHF antenna optimised for satellite work
item.description: Today, we are glad to present you a very special antenna: Aiga. Aiga is a double band VHF/UHF antenna designed for portable use.

item.title: Xurelo-6: an easy and portable alternative for working the 50MHz / 6m band
item.description: The successor of the Xurelo-4 is here! This time, we are bringing a new antenna for the 6m band: Xurelo-6.

item.title: Raposo-2: an open-source LFA low-noise yagi for the 2m band
item.description: While Yagis using a folded dipole as the radiant element have been part of television systems since decades, they only started arriving at the amateur radio comunity some years ago.

item.title: Xurelo-4: working the 70MHz / 4m band on-the-go
item.description: We are presenting our new antenna for the 4m / 70MHz band: Xurelo-4. There is not a lot of people into the 4m band, mainly because of it not being allocated for Amateur Radio use in several contruies.

item.title: Xurelo-2: bringing 2m DX to everybody
item.description: Xurelo-2 is the ideal antenna for those who want a high-gain and easy to build antenna for the 2m band which allows them to work DX.
